title: Hygieia
description:
Description :
        Tauser. who lives in a small, closed town with hazy childhood memories. The villagers believe in Hygieia, the goddess of hygiene and healing, and the village is located in an isolated place where it is impossible to get out without transportation. The Tauser, who has never left the village since he was born, spends his days just being bored. One day, a stranger appears in the village. Herreis, who introduces himself as a reporter, lives at a village inn and runs into Tawser repeatedly, and his presence makes him question everything around him.+
